listings.name: Taco Guild
listings.description: Known for its beautiful historic church building, its innovative internationally-inspired taco offerings and list of more than 200 agave spirits, Taco Guild is known for its food quality, wide range of local and global flavors and pushing tacos to their limits.
listings.caption: Succulent Al Pastor tacos with corn tortillas made fresh daily
listings.caption2: Fresh and juicy shrimp ceviche is a customer favorite
listings.caption3: Rich, tasty birria tacos drench in consumme
listings.caption4: House-fried pork skins seasoned with Tajin and lime
listings.caption5: Ahi Tuna tosadas with togarashi and gochujang aioli

listings.name: Harumi Sushi
listings.description: Vibrant sushi house with a casual ambiance, Both chef and creator, above all else, an artisan of living and eating well, Harumi’s dishes are comprised of a breathing expression of Japanese tradition united in modernity.
listings.caption: A variety of rolls featuring both fish and vetegarian options
listings.caption2: Signature purple sushi rice rolls topped with tuna and tempura flakes create the perfect bite
listings.caption3: Fresh sashimi featuring Alaskan salmon, tuna, albacore and many others everyday
listings.caption4: Savory twist on tradition with classic sushi rolls wrapped in vibrant purple rice

listings.name: Curry Corner
listings.description: A wide selection of curry dishes & other family recipes star at this low-key Indian restaurant.
listings.caption: Classic chicken masala curry with pillowy naan and aromatic saffron rice
listings.caption2: Florets of assorted vegetables fried in a spiced chick pea batter
listings.caption3: Chicken wings marinated in a blend of ginger and garlic and many authentic spices
listings.caption4: Crisp pastries stuffed with a spicy blend of potatoes and peas
listings.caption5: Tikka Masala fries are a delicious combination of crispy fries tossed and smothered in our signature spicy tikka masala sauce, drizzled with ranch dressing, and sprinkled with crumbly cheese

listings.name: Green Bowl
listings.description: Wholesome vegan meals with organic produce
listings.caption: Wholesom medly of fresh veggies, grains and plant-based goodness
listings.caption2: Refreshing acai bowl makes for a healthy, sweet treat
listings.caption3: Variety of fresh-pressed juice options everday sourced locally
listings.caption4: Get any green bowl as a wrap for on-the-go goodness
listings.caption5: Creamy chia seet and oats topped with seasonal fruits make a great breakfast option

listings.name: North Italia
listings.description: Contemporary takes on Italian classics star at this warehouse-chic trattoria with a lively bar.
listings.caption: Rich, hearty bolognese pasta full of rustic flavors
listings.caption2: Tender meatballs in vibrant tomato sauce served atop creamy velvety polenta
listings.caption3: Delicate beef carpaccio topped with pecorino stagionato, toasted pine nuts, salsa verde and arugula
listings.caption4: Buttery al dente pasta tossed with fresh clams, garlic, white wine and a hint of chili

listings.name: China Chili
listings.description: Casual eatery serving regional Chinese dishes & Asian cocktails in a traditionally decorated space.
listings.caption: Savory stir-fried noodles and perfectly seasoned fried rice
listings.caption2: House-made soup dumplings filled with warm, flavorful broth
listings.caption3: Succulent, sweet and smoky char siu pork marinated and roasted for that signature caramelized glaze
listings.caption4: Peking duck that is golden and crispy on the outside, juicy and flavorful on the inside
listings.caption5: Dim sum happy hour serves up small bites with big flavors

listings.name: Café Amore
listings.description: Specialty coffee drinks, sparkling refreshers and fresh pastries.
listings.caption: Smooth, creamy espresso topped with perfectly steamed milk, creating a rich and velvety latte
listings.caption2: The orange blossom special combines bright citris with warm spice, white chocolate and espresso
listings.caption3: Delightful freshly baked pastries from buttery almond croissants to flaky danishes and more
listings.caption4: Large selection of refreshing non-caffeinated drinks with fruit, floral and herbal infusions
listings.caption5: Breakfast and brunch provides an array of open-face panini options

listings.name: Bobby Q's BBQ
listings.description: Formerly knowna as Bobby McGee's, Bobby-Q BBQ has been serving great steaks and great barbeque since 2005. Slow cooking over Almond and Mesquite wood paired with the perfect blend of spices results in succulent hand-pulled pork, smoky sausage links, fork-ender brisket and ribs that fall right off the bone.
listings.caption: Fall-off-the-bone ribbs slathered in a smoky, tangy barbeque sauce, grilled to perfection
listings.caption2: Slow-cooked, tender pulled pork on a toasted bun topped with signature house barbeque sauce
listings.caption3: Tender, caramelized smoked rib tips served with signature barbeque sauce
listings.caption4: Q-Rolls stuffed with savory smoke beef brisket, barbeque sauce and chipotle ranch on the side
listings.caption5: Free mini donuts are the perfect sweet to end your meal
